text: The 2004/05 NTFL season was the 84th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won there 25th premiership title while defeating the Wanderers in the grand final by 28 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 15.10 (100) - 10.12 (72) | Wanderers |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 2004–05 NTFL season
